::=C6ger/Fames/Bellum/Obitus/Cerberus::

    They finally reached the Destr=
on "base." They saw their new leader, Cerberus. They all landed in unison, =
and transformed to robot mode, in unison. Obitus spoke for the group. "We a=
re here to join you, Cerberus. Do with us what you will."
    "Well," Cerbe=
rus said, transforming to robot mode. He towered above the four. "That make=
s eight of us, not counting who ever survived that blast."
    Cerberus loo=
ked towards the broken ship, and tried to figure out how he would get the i=
nformation he needed from the Computer.
    "All of you stay here, I am goi=
ng to see if I can access the main computer," He said. Then he ran towards =
the ship, not caring if any bots noticed him. Once there he walked in, the =
whole place smelled of destruction. Finding the main computer core he saw t=
hat it was completely smashed. He knew that Magmatron would have hidden ano=
ther copy of what he needed somewhere else. Looking in the crew quarters he=
 found a small, square box. It was so ordinary looking that it had to be wh=
at he needed, and it was undamaged. He took a wire from his wrist and let i=
t find it's way to the box. Using everything he had learned on Cybertron he=
 unlocked the code of the box.
    He stared in amazement at what was in th=
e box, then he took it and aimed his gun at the box and fired. The Ships co=
mputer had a backup that came on and asked him to stop. He aimed his gun at=
 the computer terminal and fired.
    "Requiescere in pax," He said. he tur=
ns and walked out of the base. Then ran back to the other seven waiting for=
 him.

(Requiescere in pax=3DRest in Peace)
